menu.name: Zucchini slice
preparation: 1. Preheat oven to 180째C (160째C fan-forced). Grease and line a 30cm x 20cm x 5cm-deep baking pan.
2. Grate zucchini. Squeeze excess moisture from zucchini.
3. Beat eggs in a large bowl until combined. Add zucchini, bacon, onion, cheese, sifted flour, and oil; mix well.
4. Spread mixture into prepared pan. Bake for about 35 minutes, or until browned.

menu.name: Easy pumpkin soup recipe
preparation: 1. In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion and cook until soft.
2. Add diced pumpkin, potato, and chicken stock. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes or until vegetables are soft.
3. Blend the soup until smooth. Return to the saucepan.
4. Stir in cream and nutmeg. Season with salt and pepper.
5. Heat through and serve.

menu.name: Easy fried rice
preparation: 1. Cook rice and let it cool.
2. Heat oil in a large frying pan. Add garlic, ginger, and vegetables. Cook until tender.
3. Push the vegetables to one side and add eggs to the other side. Scramble the eggs and mix with vegetables.
4. Add cooked rice, soy sauce, and sesame oil. Stir-fry until heated through.

menu.name: Classic shepherd's pie
preparation: 1. Brown ground beef and onions in a large skillet. Drain excess fat.
2. Stir in carrots, peas, and beef stock. Simmer until vegetables are tender.
3. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish. Spread mashed potatoes on top. Sprinkle with cheese.
4. Bake until the top is golden brown.

menu.name: Impossible quiche
preparation: 1. Preheat oven to 180째C (160째C fan-forced). Grease and line a 30cm x 20cm x 5cm-deep baking pan.
2. Cook bacon and onion until soft.
3. Combine bacon, onion, cheese, sifted flour, eggs, and milk in a bowl. Mix well.
4. Pour the mixture into the prepared pan. Bake for about 30 minutes, or until golden brown.

menu.name: Our favourite lasagne
preparation: 1. Cook lasagna sheets according to package instructions.
2. Brown ground beef and onions in a skillet. Stir in tomato sauce.
3. In a baking dish, layer lasagna sheets, meat sauce, bechamel sauce, and cheeses.
4. Repeat layers and bake until bubbly and golden brown.

menu.name: Thai beef salad
preparation: 1. Grill beef steak to your desired doneness. Let it rest and slice thinly.
2. In a large bowl, combine lettuce, cucumber, carrots, red onion, cilantro, and mint leaves.
3. Add sliced beef and chili.
4. In a small bowl, mix lime juice and fish sauce. Drizzle over the salad.

menu.name: Curried sausages
preparation: 1. Brown sausages and onions in a large pan.
2. Stir in apple, curry powder, and flour.
3. Add chicken stock and tomato sauce. Simmer until sausages are cooked through.
4. Serve with rice.

menu.name: Chicken and vegetable stir-fry
preparation: 1. Slice chicken breast into strips and marinate in soy sauce, ginger, and garlic.
2. Heat oil in a wok and stir-fry chicken until cooked.
3. Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
4. Serve with rice.

menu.name: San choy bau
preparation: 1. Brown ground pork and mushrooms in a skillet. Add water chestnuts.
2. Stir in soy sauce and hoisin sauce.
3. Serve the mixture in lettuce leaves.
